entry.title: ZpellCatz "Kick and Start" Update (0.95.2) September '22 + ZpellCatz' Kickstarter Starts Soon
entry.content:
A new version of the Pumpkin Prologue is ready to be played. It's in a good shape now for the upcoming Kickstarter campaign. Read on.

entry.title: ZpellCatz' Kickstarter Campaign Starts Soon + Legends of Pixelia v1.05
entry.content:
The Kickstarter campaign for ZpellCatz starts in mid-September. Also, Legends of Pixelia has been updated for maintenance (v1.05). Read on.

entry.title: ZpellCatz "Dark Harvest" Update (0.94.0) June '22 + Updated Prologue Trailer
entry.content:
Spell effects have greatly been improved and there is a new version of the Pumpkin Prologue available to give them a try. There's also an updated trailer and a guaranteed epic item drop. Read on.
